frontmatter.title: Sparse Merkle Tree란 무엇일까? (번역)
frontmatter.description: Here’s where sparse Merkle trees come into play. A sparse Merkle tree is like a standard Merkle tree, except the contained data is indexed, and each datapoint is placed at the leaf that corresponds to that datapoint’s index.
